code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RedeemReward=_ref=>{let{userId,rewardId}=_ref;const API_URL='http://localhost:5000/api';const redeemReward=(userId,rewardId)=>{return axios.post(`${API_URL}/rewards/redeem`,{userId,rewardId});};const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[success,setSuccess]=useState(null);const handleRedeem=()=>{redeemReward(userId,rewardId).then(response=>{setSuccess('Reward redeemed successfully!');setError(null);}).catch(error=>{setSuccess(null);setError('Failed to redeem reward.');});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleRedeem,children:"Redeem Reward"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error}),success&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'green'},children:success})]});};export default RedeemReward;
